评论详情: Nice! Comfy, used for renaissance fair!

评论概述: Perfect top for a swamp witch costume!
评论详情: The original swamp witch costume I wanted was out of stock so I decided to piece together one. I felt this style top was perfect for what I was going for.  Loved and preferred the off shoulder sleeves as I felt it added a little sexiness to it. The cuffed sleeves were nice as it added color and were able to be as tight or loose as you wanted. The only thing I did not like is that it had a tendency to ride up a little the more I moved resulting in me having to readjust from time to time. If not, the top went a little too high up on the chest as well as the bottom feeling like it wasn’t down low enough. Overall, I’m pleased with it.
I’m so happy with my order. Love the color.
It's cute and comfy and sits well under a corset or cincher!

I purchased a large because I'm top heavy, and worry about tops not fitting. I could have gone with a medium and it would have been fine but the large was just fine too. It's comfortable, light weight, and is great for those long hot days at the Ren fairs.

The shirt is very flattering and went great with my ren fair outfit however it was tight around the arms where the cuffs are, and they could only be loosened a tiny bit. The cuffs were uncomfortable with the temperature being 80 and getting a little sweaty. The shirt will also ride up if you don’t have a belt.

Bought this as part of my pirate costume and I'm very excited. Can't wait til I have everything so I can see it all together. Thick material, not sheer at all. Loose-fitting which makes it comfortable.

This shirt does have a texture to it that makes it appear higher quality than it is which is nice for the price and the pleather arm bands are adjustable but be warry if you have smaller arms. I had to restring them in a different way so they would sit snug.

评论概述: A bodice ripper without the ripping.
评论详情: I got more action from this than from a black lace nightie. Who knew.

Thin materials but not such that it looks like it with shred while wearing it. The faux leather around the arms sticks to the skin a bit (somewhat annoying). I bought a 2XL - weigh 192 lbs and am 5'2" and it fit well. Doesn't accentuate belly like many similar pieces do. Came a couple inches below belly button. Good piece for ren faire.
OMG. I love love love this top.  Everything about this top is perfect.
I bought this for a Renaissance fair. Great shirt. It is true to the size. I would recommend washing according to the directions.

The leatherette armbands are very tight.  It may fit many women, but I lift weights so my upper arms are a little larger.  It was also hard to move the arms easily into a comfortable position on my arms.

Very cute shirt. Worked perfectly for the pictures I took. However, it was a bit uncomfortable with the seams. It rubbed skin a bit. Nothing that can’t be tolerated.  The leather bits were the most comfortable part of the shirt. I still would purchase again with this in mind.
Except the arms can be a little tight.  Or I just got big arms. Lol
A little tight on my arms but otherwise perfect. Highly recommend.
A value product that looks and feels lovely.
I knew the leather arm straps were going to be tight so I have a plan to alter. Shirts doesn’t sit well at the bottom but maybe a wash will help
Very thin, very see through. Poor quality fabric, there's nothing even remotely note worthy about this shirt. It feels terrible, looks terrible and not worth the money spent.
Great quality, true fit, period correct look
Very very tight in the arms. Ordered an XL as recommended. It’s a little short and the arms are just oooof! Size up.
The perfect addition to my bar maiden costume. By the looks of it, once I wash it, the "leather" will start peeling. I'll update then.
Wore this to RenFaire and got tons of compliments
Helped tie my outfit together. A bit more in the *modest* side which is what I wanted. Only complaint is the pleather on the arms was a little tight but probably stretchable if I put in the effort.

My biggest issue was that it came in with a rip already in one of the sleeves, however for the price you are paying it is very poorly made. Sheer, thin fabric, with pleather that is very unpleasant to look at.  For a Halloween costume this might be the shirt for you, but it just isn’t for me. I could get a far better quality shirt with a similar look for roughly the same price at a ren fair. (The next fair I can go to isn’t until spring and I was hoping for a piece that would boost my spirits until then)
A little adjustment the pleather got very sticky to my arm. Humidity was high but ouch pulling off.
Held up well for my event
Light weight fabric, natural beige color with faux leather on the arms. Fit is true to size. Sexy off the shoulder look makes wearing this shirt fun.
Priced correctly for quality...too flimsy no structure

评论概述: You know, for an extra large shirt you'd think it'd fit a person who usually wears a medium.
评论详情: Everything fits but the fake leather on the arms that make this almost unwearable. Going to have to remove those and just have it as a short sleeve shirt.
I liked the top but it just didn’t go with what I wanted to wear it with but nice top!
Stretch at middle makes it pretty versatile size wise but I wish I sized down. The top above the waist is a little baggy, as are the arm cuffs. Fabric and color is nice
Great quality

Very cute shirt. I bought it for my costume for the renaissance faire but ended up returning it since the arm bands were too small for me and they can't be adjusted. However I did see someone at the faire wearing this shirt and it looked so good on her! I would also recommend sizing up if you want it to bunch up around your chest like it does in the picture.

Never before has my chest looked so filled than in this outfit. I felt like a medival goddess. This was for a medieval wedding I attended and by god it did the job. I love this seller and will def buy more in the future if I go to ren fairs. Never written a review before but this is hands down worth it. So happy with how it looks. I’m 5’ 2. Definetly get a corset to match with it, I think it looks so much better this way
Good 👍

Got this for the ren fair, it was so comfy all day. I was able to adjust it as needed easily and the sleeves actually didn’t bother me. I do wish they were a bit more adjustable but they worked perfectly for the day!

I wore this to RenFaire and got a lot of complements! I love that it really looks the part, as far as Renaissance . It's very light and airy, very comfortable to wear. I would definitely purchase again!
Love the color. Arm bands are a bit tight but I made it work cause I love the style

I ordered a size up based on reviews for bustier girls saying it ran small. I definitely think i could have sized down not up. Im a 38DDD and usually wear an XL. I ordered the 2XL and id say its true to size. Giving them five stars because thats my fault, not theirs. Ill be exchanging for a smaller size and color change (to fit my outfit, nothing wrong with the apricot at all). The fabric is so soft and not see through, when i originally tried it on i had on a dark green bra and you could t see it at all. The color is accurate and nothing was wonky with it. Cant wait to get my true size!
This shirt is perfect for renaissance outfits its super comfortable and pretty fits perfectly
Good quality! Perfect size I love it very happy with it.
Loved it. Really cute. Only thing is it's a little shorter then I thought it would be. It looks really good though

评论概述: Sleeves waaay too small! Such a shame!
评论详情: Bottom line up front, the sleeves point blank would not fit over my arms. I am 5’3, 130lbs and the sleeves were so tight I couldn’t get the shirt on at all (I ordered a small). I loosened the strings, that’s not the issue. The issue is the seam between the leather and the cloth of the shirt. It’s such a shame. This is a beautiful shirt and would have been perfect for the renaissance faire this weekend. :-(
Very nice fit.
This top is really cute and fit perfectly.
Comfortable

评论概述: Sleeves too tight but otherwise great!
评论详情: I absolutely love this shirt! My only issue was how tight the sleeves were. I was only able to wear the shirt for an hour before it became very uncomfortable.
Nice but not good for me. Little to cozy for shirt. Nice style.
This was perfect. Size was as expected and it looked exactly as it does in the photos.

评论概述: Faux leather sleeves for tiny arms!
评论详情: I got a large first because it was on sale. The large was too big for me at 5 feet 120 lbs but i kinda knew it would be... i can adjust it.  So i ordered a medium next, to get the better size. It was perfect except the arms... i am a small, non-muscular girl and those sleeves are impossibly tight. Must be for toothpick arms. Such a shame something like that ruins it for me and i STILL have to break out my sewing machine to fix it.

This shirt was worth all the research to find it. It made the perfect Renaissance festival outfit. It’s stretchy, comfortable (I have a sensitive skin) and looks amazing. The best compliment I got was a police officer asking me if I worked at the ren fest right before they were closing.
Shirt is very nice, however it is a little shorter than I would’ve liked, but overall very happy with the shirt.
I love it. I am a 2x and it fit perfectly. Comfortable and cute!
Was used for my Halloween costume and it was perfect! Fit well and looks good if you’re using a corset/belt with it! Would recommend to anyone who is using for a costume or cosplay.

评论概述: Crop top fit and skinny arms but I like it!
评论详情: I have used this about 3 times now I was hoping the arms would stretch a little. They do NOT. The ties do not actually tighten or loosen anything. They are just for looks but it looks GOOD! I used it tucked under a skirt and that is the way I prefer it, I don’t think I would use it not tucked in as it is not flattering. It is holding up well so far and I am surprised. I’ve gotten a lot of compliments! Not see through and very stretchy everywhere but the arms.

Bought for my daughter for her costume, steampunk elf. She wore it for the Renaissance fair, halloween day at school, and trick or treat. She loves it. Only size issue is with the bust. If you have a smaller bust it could be an issue.

It’s a little tight on the arms but manageable and it frizzes out at the bottom but a corset will tuck it all in. Pretty good did the price ! It all came together really well and it was well packaged . Would purchase again and have no regrets . Shield maiden costume !!
Love this shirt. I bought it for dancing at shows and it is so comfortable!

评论概述: Wish I got a smaller size
评论详情: I want with Amazon's recommend size for me and I guess they think I'm fatter then I am (rude). So it's a bit big but my arms are muscley so It fits sung on my arms.

评论概述: Should have sized up. “Leather” on Sleeve doesn’t stretch.
评论详情: I bought a size Large, but definitely should have gone up a size, if only because I think it would have fit better around my arms, and been a bit longer. (The “leather” cuff was a bit tight). I’m 5’2”, about 160. Busty, & with a larger than needed waist, and less than toned arms. (LOL).  To wear a corset belt with it, and have shirt material sticking out below, a larger shirt would have been better for me.  THAT SAID… if you have a larger chest, don’t mind the length, and your arms are more toned, you could still wear a Large. (Assuming you’re short & thicker like me). It’s stretchy material. Also, because the leather on the arms is tighter, it helps keep the top of the shirt down over the shoulders, like most would want to wear it anyway.  *I washed with dark colors on Delicate, and let it air dry. No shrinkage.

评论概述: Too short! Who was this made for?
评论详情: This shirt was far too short! It doesn’t look like it’s supposed to be a crop top..

评论概述: Runs a bit large but I’m 100% ordering more
评论详情: I added the waist belt but the shirt is so comfortable. I’m 6’ 180lbs and I got a size large. I probably could have gone medium. Most comfortable shirt I own.
This shirt is so flattering and comfortable. I wore it to the Renaissance Faire here for pirate day and got so many compliments.
I bought this to wear for Octoberfest (I'm a bartender). It is so cute and comfortable. You can adjust the leaves with the ties on the side. I got so many compliments on it.
Material is super comfortable, fits very well. The fabric is a little thinner then i'd like;however it still works well
Exactly what I needed. Perfect fit. Great addition to my Victorian skirt.

评论概述: Sizing not accurate.  Pass for me
评论详情: I ordered a large according to the sizing chart, was totally disappointed, this runs really small. The description is misleading. The material was just ok, shirt not well made. I would not recommend this to anyone.

Love it! I bought the extra large but I think I probably could have sized it down to the large. It has a ton of stretch from all the elastic smocking. I originally purchased this to complete an outfit for a Renaissance Festival but this would be super cute with a pair of jeans.

Wasn’t the one I wanted and doesn’t go as well with what I’m paring it with. The one I wanted was no longer an option to only magically come back a few days after I could have returned the one I got for the one I really wanted.
It’s really cute, it was a little baggy on me but that was because I didn’t get the right size. It’s super cute and a lot more comfortable than what I was expecting.
Fits to the size perfectly 5

I bought this shirt to be part of my Ghost Pirate costume this year. It’s perfect! I read the other reviews and did purchase a small when normally I would buy a medium. I am larger on top and the small fits great. It’s a tad see through but a strapless bra will fix that. I recommend!
Liked the shirt. Made good. Mid-drift. Length not long. Waiting for my new shirt to come.
The arm bands are so tight and you can't loosen them
So comfortable and perfect fit
This blouse is very flattering. Great Quality.
Everything fits on it but booby area. Very large there. I have your average sized c cups. It made for like triple DDs. Other then that. I like it.
Small was not small enough. Even the elastic was too loose.
perfect for ren fest could have gotten a size smaller

I bought this for cosplay. The material is a good quality, soft and breathable. I was skeptical, but am pleasantly surprised. The arm cuffs fit me just fine, and I am a more athletic build. However, I could see how they could be a problem. They fit snug.

I love the shirt, but the sleeves have no stretch to them. Had to pop a couple stitches to get the sleeves to even go up, but that leather does not have any stretch. The length is good with a high top skirt or pants and the neck doesn't fall to the side or further down than in the photos. The fabric I super soft.

Overall the quality was decent. However the “leather” arm pieces were tight and did not stretch. Even with the short area that laces, they seemed fairly small. So beware of tagt with sizing. The shirt itself was roomy and comfortable. Thin material, but didn’t seem see through. I ended up returning this too due to the sleeves.

I cut mine at the top. It's as pictured. Sits on shoulders weird. Frumpy and not comfortable would be comfortable if it hugged. But even elastic around the waist is loose. Even if I got a size smaller it would still sit on shoulders weird and arms would be too tight.

评论概述: This is not Cotton fabric as described
评论详情: This is Not Cotton,it is polyester .  I wanted a Cotton Shirt. I specifically read the product information and only ordered it because it said it was Cotton. Very disappointing that the description lied about the fabric.
This shirt is cute, but it makes me look like I'm borrowing my mom's clothes.

评论概述: You get what you pay for.
评论详情: Fit pretty nice — the arms were a little small. Not entirely see through but not super thick. The stretch at the waist and shoulders was as described. I was pleased with it, especially considering the price.

Just received this in the mail today. It’s a lot lighter than the picture shows, the arms are very tight and didn’t quite fit my arms but can make do with the fit. If you have any type of chest it’s going to make the shirt more of a belly shirt. Then lastly the strings were missing on one of the sleeves.
I am planning to take this top with me on vacation. It’s cute and I plan to wear it around the campground.
This shirt was perfect. I thought the arm parts would be tight but nope.
The quality seems to be very good.  There is no slippage in the shoulders. The waist is flattering without a belt. I'm thinking of getting another one for everyday wear.
I love this top! It fits pretty much as expected, but was a bit shorter than I anticipated. The pleather on the sleeves also tended to be a bit tight despite loosening the laces.

I got this to wear for Ren Faire. Some of the reviews said the sleeves were too tight on the arms so I was worried about that, but it isn't too tight for me, it is comfortable and not tight against my skin. Plus the laces are adjustable. Overall it fits and looks good with my outfit, I do wish it was a little longer but it's fine since I'm wearing a high waisted skirt and a waist cincher belt with it.

评论概述: The sleeve are a little tight
评论详情: Love the off shoulder option
Cute, comfy.  Perfect for ren fest!

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for!
评论详情: I got it for scarborough fair and it's exactly what I was looking for!
This shirt went perfectly with my corset for a Medieval festival! I got so many compliments and did not think thr sleeves were too tight like some other reviews suggested.
I am wearing this blouse with a brown faux skirt I purchased 2 days ago. They are made for each other. Wearing this Friday to business lunch.
The sleeves are too large around and can’t be tightened without looking terrible.
It’s really comfortable and fit as expected
